summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fifth Street to West Eightieth Street; and West Seventy-fifth Street, from the west line of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest on the south to the east line of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest on the north, by grading, curbing and constructing cement sidewalks, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 34883; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
